image_prompt: A photo-realistic, cinematic wide shot inside a modern, clean industrial manufacturing facility. In the foreground, a diverse group of three maintenance professionals (one female, two male) are gathered around a large, complex industrial turbine. They are wearing standard PPE including hard hats, safety glasses, and high-visibility vests. One technician is holding a tablet (back of device visible only) referencing a digital schematic, while pointing at a specific component on the machine. The background shows blurred automated production lines and soft, cool industrial lighting. The atmosphere conveys professionalism, technology, and precision. No text or overlays.
